long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Fly or Die, also known as FlyOrDie.io, is an engaging and dynamic multiplayer survival game. In this game, players navigate through an evolving ecosystem as various creatures, each with unique abilities and dietary needs. Starting as a small fly, the goal is to eat and survive, progressively evolving into higher forms of life. The game is popular for its simple mechanics, challenging gameplay, and the thrill of evolving through different stages of the food chain.

How to Play
Players start as a tiny fly and must consume food indicated by green outlines to gain experience points. As your experience grows, you evolve into different creatures, each with its own diet and predators. The key to success is to constantly eat, avoid predators, and adapt to the changing environment and abilities of your current creature.

Game Controls
Mouse Movement: Control the direction of your creature.
Left Mouse Click: Activate special abilities for certain creatures.
Enter Key: Chat with other players.
